message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $10000! It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. I've had great feedback from other customers who have purchased similar products. What do you say? Are you ready to take the plunge?
I'm interested in the product, but I'd like to wait and see what the quality is before making a decision.

Ahaha, I knew you'd be interested! Well, I'll let you in on a little secret: I've got another one just like it. In fact, I've got a whole batch of them. And I'm willing to let you have it for the same price of $10000. What do you say? Are you ready to grab another deal?
I'm not interested in another low-quality product. I'd like to see if the next product is high-quality before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, Bob! But let me tell you, this one's a real gem! Okay, okay, I know what you're thinking... 'Another low-quality product?' But trust me, this one's different. It's... it's... well, it's just as good as the last one, if not better! And at $10000, it's a steal! What do you say? Are you willing to give it a chance?
I'm not convinced that this product is different from the previous ones. I'd like to see the quality before making a decision.

Ah, I knew it! I knew this one was special! This product is a real showstopper, Bob! It's the crème de la crème, the best of the best! And I'm willing to let it go for the same price as the others, $10000. But I'll tell you what - I'll throw in a special bonus with this one. If you buy it, I'll give you a personalized thank-you note, signed by the manufacturer themselves! It's a rare opportunity, Bob. Are you ready to take the plunge and get your hands on this incredible product?
I'm not impressed by the bonus, and I'm still not convinced that the product is high-quality. I'd like to see the quality before making a decision.

And who knows, you might even find a way to make it work for you. So, what do you say? Are you ready to take a chance and see what this product can do for you?
I'm willing to take a chance on this product, given the unique features you mentioned. I'll buy it!
